i1.name: Relentless Assault
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Jax''' gains {{sti|{{as|{{pp|6|key=%|3.5 to 11|1 to 16}} '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for {{fd|2.5}} seconds every time he lands a [[basic attack]], stacking up to 8 times for a maximum of {{sti|{{as|{{pp|6|key=%|28 to 88|1 to 16}} '''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
Stacks fall off one at a time every {{fd|0.25}} seconds after not attacking for {{fd|2.5}} seconds.
i1.notes:
* The enhanced attacks will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal. '''Jax''' keeps generating stacks of ''Relentless Assault'', even if his attacks are getting {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} or if they {{tip|Blind|miss}}.
* ''Relentless Assault'' will be triggered when attacking structures.
* Attacks that trigger ''Relentless Assault'' will always refresh its duration (even when fully stacked).

q1.name: Leap Strike
description: If his target is an enemy, he deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to them.
q1.notes:
* ''Leap Strike'' will damage the target regardless of whether or not they remained where they were at the time of ''Jax's'' casting as well as regardless of whether or not ''Jax'' successfully dashed.
* ''Leap Strike'' can be used on any targetable allied or enemy unit (except structures)
** This includes [[champion]]s, [[minion]]s, [[ward]]s, and champion pets ({{ai|Noxious Trap|Teemo}}, {{ai|Demacian Standard|Jarvan IV}}, {{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh}}).
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage (including when {{ai|Empower|Jax|empowered}}) but will not prevent the dash.

effects.str: • Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 60% AP)

w1.name: Empower
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jax's''' next basic attack or {{ai|Leap Strike|Jax}} within 10 seconds deals {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}. If ''Empower'' is used on a basic attack, it will have {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}.
w1.notes:
* ''Empower'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Jax's'' previous orders.
* ''Empower's'' bonus damage will cause {{iis|Muramana}} to trigger twice with a single basic attack.
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* ''Empower's'' bonus damage will not interact with {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}}.
** It will neither affect structures.
* The enhanced attack can be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} and will be consumed afterwards.
* ''Empower'' will be consumed if the attack {{tip|blind|misses}}.

e1.name: Counter Strike
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Jax''' enters ''Evasion'', a defensive stance, for up to 2 seconds, causing all basic attacks against him to miss. '''Jax''' also takes 25% reduced [[damage]] from all champion [[area of effect]] [[champion ability|abilities]]. After 1 second, '''Jax''' can reactivate to end it immediately.
At the end of the duration, '''Jax''' {{tip|stun|stuns}} all nearby enemies for 1 second and deals {{as|physical damage}} to them, increased by 20% for each attack dodged, up to a 100% increase.
e1.notes:
* ''Counter Strike'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Jax's'' previous orders.
* ''Counter Strike'' is not a [[channel]]ed ability.
** '''Jax''' will still dodge attacks and stun opponents when the duration ends even while being disabled by [[crowd control]] effects.
* '''Jax''' cannot dodge [[turret]] attacks.
* ''Counter Strike'' will also dodge abilities that can trigger [[on-hit effect]]s ({{ai|Parrrley|Gangplank}}, {{ai|Mystic Shot|Ezreal}}) which will count towards ''Counter Strike's'' increased damage.

effects.levelingtext: {{st|Minimum Physical Damage|{{ap|55 to 155}} {{as|(+ 50% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}{{st|Maximum Physical Damage|{{ap|55*2 to 155*2}} {{as|(+ 100% '''bonus''' AD)}}}}
effects.str:
• Minimum Physical Damage: (+ 50% bonus AD)
  • Maximum Physical Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD)

r1.name: Grandmaster's Might
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Jax''' deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} on every third basic attack within {{fd|2.5}} seconds of each other.
{{sbc|Active - The Champ:}} '''Jax''' gains {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}} for 8 seconds.
r1.notes:
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* ''Grandmaster's Might's'' bonus damage will not interact with {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}}.
** It will neither affect structures (though hitting them will still grant stacks and, as such, the sound effect will play).
* If the enhanced attack will be {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} and/or {{ai|Spirit's Refuge|Shen|blocked}} the bonus damage will not apply.
** If ''Jax'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} both the enhanced attack and the bonus damage will be consumed.
*** Yet ''Grandmaster's Might's'' stacks will not (though they will still wear off after {{fd|2.5}} seconds).
* Despite being an [[on-hit effect]] ''Grandmaster's Might's'' damage will trigger spell effects as a single-target spell (Spell Vamp, {{iis|Rylai's Crystal Scepter}} {{nie|Icy}}).
** It will also cause {{iis|Muramana}} bonus damage to trigger twice with a single attack.
* ''Grandmaster's Might's'' bonus resistances are calculated both on-cast and will update dynamically {{tt|every 0.25s|on every 'update frame', the first update to adjust the stats again post-activation is therefore at a variable time ≤ 0.25 after cast, and all further ones in 0.25s intervals again}} over the duration.
* ''Grandmaster's Might'' will not proc on wards.
* There is a weird bug occuring with ''Grandmaster's Might's'' passive happening on turrets. When '''Jax''' basic attacks a turret 3 times (and only 3 times) and then quickly change target (within {{fd|2.5}} seconds), his 3 next basic attacks will apply ''Grandmaster's Might's'' passive 2 times (on the first and third basic attack).

effects.str:
• Bonus Armor: (+ 50% bonus AD)
  • Bonus Magic Resistance: (+ 20% AP)
